scripts.minor: git checkout develop && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --scope public && npm run prepare_release
scripts.major: git checkout develop && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --scope public && npm run prepare_release
scripts.patch: git checkout develop && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --scope public && npm run prepare_release
scripts.prepare_release: git push && git push --tags && git checkout master && git pull && git merge develop && git push
